projects.title: PokeCollect
projects.description: A Pokemon card collection tracker that allows users to manage their collection, view card details, and view market prices. Developed as a team using Agile principles and integrates with the Pokemon TCG API.
details: Integrated Pokemon TCG API for real-time card data
Implemented collection management features with local storage
Developed responsive UI with modern design principles
Used Agile methodology for team collaboration
Built with vanilla JavaScript and HTML/CSS
projects.imageAlt: A screenshot of the PokeCollect application dashboard.

projects.title: DSA Visualizer
projects.description: Developing an interactive tool to help students learn data structures and algorithms through step-by-step visuals. Includes algorithms such as Bubble Sort and Merge Sort and includes various data structures.
details: Implemented step-by-step visualization for sorting algorithms
Added interactive controls for algorithm execution
Created visual representations of data structures
Built with React and D3.js for dynamic rendering
projects.imageAlt: A screenshot of the DSA Visualizer sorting interface.

projects.title: Now Playing Display
projects.description: Real time display of currently playing song specifically optimized to display on RaspberryPi. Uses Spotify API to fetch user information and handles authentication process.
details: Integrated Spotify Web API for real-time playback data
Created responsive UI for small screens
Built with Python and Flask backend
projects.imageAlt: A photo of the Now Playing Display running on a RaspberryPi.
